dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Hello, I'm trapped in this strange cave. Can you help me?

dialogues.speaker: NPC (Non-Playable Character)
dialogues.text: Ah, a brave adventurer. What do you mean by 'trapped'?

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: I was exploring the cave when I stumbled upon this chamber and now I'm locked in.

dialogues.speaker: NPC (Non-Playable Character)
dialogues.text: Let me check if I can find a way to open the door for you. Ah, yes! I see a pressure plate over there.
